kv5.2:5.3: Sekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ jānāti passati, diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv5.2:5.6: nanu sekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ na jānāti na passati, adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ na upasampajja viharati, na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv5.2:5.8: Hañci sekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ na jānāti na passati, adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ na upasampajja viharati, na kāyena phusitvā viharati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.2:6.1: Asekhassa asekhaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, asekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ jānāti passati, diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv5.2:6.3: Sekhassa asekhaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, sekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ jānāti passati, diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv5.2:7.1: Sekhassa asekhaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, sekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ na jānāti na passati, adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ na upasampajja viharati, na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv5.2:7.3: Asekhassa asekhaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, asekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ na jānāti na passati, adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ na upasampajja viharati, na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv5.2:8.6: sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa sotāpattiphale ñāṇaṃ atthīti?
kv5.2:8.11: arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa arahatte ñāṇaṃ atthīti?
kv5.2:9.5: “bhagavā uḷāro”ti jānāti, “sāriputto thero, mahāmoggallāno thero uḷāro”ti jānātīti?
kv5.2:9.8: “bhagavā uḷāro”ti jānāti, “sāriputto thero, mahāmoggallāno thero uḷāro”ti jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
